arts.ttl: Crystal Palace see approach for Lens’ Andy Diouf rejected
arts.sum: According to a report from Fabrizio Romano, Crystal Palace have seen an approach for Andy Diouf (21) rejected by RC Lens. Diouf’s move to Lens is yet to truly work out with…

arts.ttl: Lens and Rennes remain in talks over Brice Samba
arts.sum: Lens and Rennes are still in talks over the transfer of Brice Samba (30), according to the Artois side’s CEO Pierre Dréossi. Speaking to DAZN before Lens’ Ligue 1 home…

arts.ttl: ‘He will leave’ – Lens’ CEO provides update on Manchester City target
arts.sum: Lens CEO Pierre Dréossi has confirmed that centre-back Abdukodir Khusanov (20) is expected to leave the Artois side amid interest from Premier League sides, including Manchester City. The Uzbekistan international…

Lens have been inconsistent in front of their own fans in recent weeks, winning two and losing three of their last five. Toulouse, meanwhile, have won six of their last eight in all competitions, tho...

arts.ttl: Will Still drops Brice Samba from Lens’ matchday squad amid Rennes transfer saga
arts.sum: Lens manager Will Still has kept his word and dropped club captain Brice Samba (30) from the Artois side’s matchday squad amid the France international’s transfer to Rennes. RMC Sport…

arts.ttl: Man City, Tottenham handed transfer boost as Abdukodir Khusanov's agent makes statement
arts.sum: Manchester City and Tottenham Hotspur receive a boost in their pursuit of Lens defender Abdukodir Khusanov after the player's representative opens the door to a potential transfer.

arts.ttl: Seko Fofana resigns from Lens board following Rennes transfer
arts.sum: Rennes midfielder Seko Fofana (29) has resigned from Racing Club de Lens’ board in the wake of his transfer to their Ligue 1 rivals from Brittany, as reported by La…

arts.ttl: Rennes to continue Brice Samba pursuit, despite setback
arts.sum: As things stand this Saturday, Brice Samba’s (30) move from RC Lens to Ligue 1 rivals Stade Rennais is off. However, the latter will continue to push to sign the…

arts.ttl: Lens’ Kevin Danso rejects Wolves move
arts.sum: RC Lens centre-back Kevin Danso (26) rejected a move to Wolverhampton Wanderers, Foot Mercato journalist Santi Aouna understands, forcing the Premier League club to sound out alternative targets. As per L’Équipe, an agreement has been reached…

arts.ttl: Lens cancel Brice Samba’s €14m transfer to Rennes
arts.sum: Racing Club de Lens have decided to pull the plug on Brice Samba’s expected move to Ligue 1 rivals Rennes, according to a report from RMC Sport. Both clubs reached…
